item.title: Debian修改时区及定时同步时间
item.description: 先查看Debian的默认时区： 1root@devops:~# timedatectl 2Local time: Fri 2022-11-24 10:13:29 UTC 3 Universal time: Fri 2022-11-24 10:13:29 UTC 4 RTC time: Fri 2022-11-24 10:13:29 5 Time zone: UTC (UTC, +0000) 6System clock synchronized: no 7 NTP service: inactive 8 RTC in local TZ: no 现在当前是UTC，修改为As
